title: Garen Winrate dropped from 54% to 50% and another nerf is incoming
body: Basically his nerf dropped his Winrate by 4% and with the removal of Conqueror , he is getting hit again

replies.body: Kinda sad seeing Riot playing favorites and catering to low elo crybabies
It's insane watching people try to argue that garen is a highly mobile champion, and that their positioning just isnt garbage.
Conqueror isn't getting removed. Its true damage conversion is getting removed.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ahPyobcQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-24T06:32:06.777+0000)
>
> Conqueror isn't getting removed. Its true damage conversion is getting removed.

I did not know that removing true damage would not reduce damage dealt against an enemy with any armour. Thank you for educating me about this.

It's nitpicky, but KFCeytron is right.

He didn't say that the removal of the true damage conversion won't be a nerf for Garen. But OP made it sound like Riot plans to delete the rune entirely, which isn't the case. One aspect of Conqueror is getting removed, not the entire keystone.
Garen can't proc it on the PBE but I maintain that it's overrated on him except for allowing Precision primary

> [{quoted}](name=DEMACIAA BABY,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ahPyobcQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-10-24T05:29:25.629+0000)
>
> Basically his nerf dropped his Winrate by 4% and with the removal of Conqueror , he is getting hit again

I only pray they compensation buff Yasuo when this rune is changed. Or Riven. They are important champs.
Garen is one of the least affected users of Conqueror, since his E already shreds armor.
